pageContext.claim: “During the Democrat National Convention and caucus they took twice, I thought I was sort of, maybe they made a mistake. You saw that. They took the word 'God' out of the Pledge of Allegiance twice.”
pageContext.analysis: Actually, the pledge was recited in full each night of the convention. he words “under God” were omitted at the start of daytime meetings for two caucuses, though.
